name: Defend Your Pink Planet
description:
Your planet is attacked by alien who try to detroy it by bombading it. You must defend it! 

The main mechanic of this game is that your planet is eroding with every attack (similare to worms) so you must be fast to destroy the enemy before your planet disappears.

This game was made in 48h with Game Maker Studio for the Ludum Dare 38 ( April 2017) on the theme "A Small Word"
